extendedInfo.description: CTIA E-Tech Award Winner for Best Productivity, Utility & Public Safety AppsWinner of Mobile Star Awards "Best Consumer Security Application""With GadgetTrak's sneaky defenses, it almost makes you wish your smartphone or laptop gets snatched." - Forbes"GadgetTrak... puts RoboCop to shame" - Engadget_______________________________________________________________With all of the photos, contacts, apps and music on your Android, losing it would be a massive pain. Unfortunately, that pain is felt by thousands of smartphone users every day. Ask them â they wish they'd had GadgetTrak installed.When your device goes missing, immediately log into your account using any web browser and enable tracking. GadgetTrak Mobile Security will spring to life and generate location reports, including map points, longitude & latitude and IP address to help you pinpoint your lost device. You can even backup and wipe your data remotely!**************************************************IMPORTANT NOTES:â¢ Visit http://www.gadgettrak.com/products/mobile to get your FREE 7-day trial accountâ¢ NOW AVAILABLE IN ALL COUNTRIES! **************************************************=================Features=================â Location Tracking âIf your device has GPS capability it will be used by GadgetTrak to get the most accurate location possible. Even without GPS, GadgetTrak can use cell towers and/or advanced Wi-Fi positioning technology to pinpoint the location of your device usually within a few meters.â Device Alarm âIf your device is lost or stolen you can remotely enable a piercing alarm, even if it's in silent mode.â Secure Encrypted Backup âPhotos and contacts are encrypted and uploaded and stored online securely.â Remote Data Wipe âRemotely wipe personal data stored on your device and media card.â SIM Change Detection âDetects unauthorized SIM change and alerts you to any new number assigned to the device.â Tamper Proof âOnce tracking is activated, the software settings cannot be modified unless deactivated.â Enterprise Ready âGadgetTrak Mobile Security is designed for organizations to deploy across departments with multiple administrators and GadgetTrak Mobile Security is the first and only mobile security solution be Enterprise Certified by AT&T.â Cross Platform âGadgetTrak has apps to protect your laptop (Mac & Windows) as well as iPad/iPhone/iPod touch and BlackBerry phones and tablets.==============Need Help?==============Download the GadgetTrak Mobile Security Installation & Usage Manual here: http://www.gadgettrak.com/support/downloadsWe take pride in providing great support for all of our products. If you have questions, concerns, or feedback let us know and we'll get back to you as quickly as possible: http://www.gadgettrak.com/support/

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: Terrible.  App isn\'t even invisible in application list. If phone is stolen...they could just uninstall this app and tracking ends!  Stupid idiots.

reviews.comment: Says that my info doesn\'t match the server, yet I can log in with the same credentials on my laptop and desktop. Tried 10 times, gave up. :(
